Created: Nov. 15th, 2009

When you don't have a television you have to get c

Tags:

Cool

  • Vimeo Homepage

    This site is generally amateur user-gen videos but it's slightly classier than YouTube and the homepage features lots of artsy stuff.

  • Video Jug

    This is best for cooking instructions

  • Channel 101

    This one is hit or miss but it's got a cool concept in that you can vote stuff on and off the air.

  • Redux

    This site is more of an aggregator of meme-worthy YouTube videos. TV mode allows you to watch continuous play.

  • Hulu

    Not sure if this is only available in the US but it's HD and you can watch every episode of 30 Rock at once.

Cooler

  • My Damn Channel

    Most people already know "You Suck at Photoshop" but newer shows like Easy to Assemble, Wainy Days and Coolio's aptly named cooking show "Cooking with Coolio" are also funny.

  • Sidereel

    This site has a ton of early stuff. It's just an aggregator so there are multiple sources.

Coolest

  • Vice Television

    From the makers of Vice Magazine, Vice TV is a short documentary channel with great topics. From living in sewer tunnels in Bogota to smuggling into the Khyber pass to shoot guns, the channel is half Anderson Cooper 360 and half Jack Ass.
